properties.entry: INSERT INTO MG_MEMBER (MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_PNO, MEMBER_GENDER , ADDRESS, EMAIL, PHONE) VALUES (SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? , ?, ?, ?)
SELECT /* com.greedy.jsp.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectEncryptPwd() */ A.MEMBER_PWD FROM MG_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.MEMBER_ID = ?

SELECT /* com.greedy.jsp.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectLoginMember() */ A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_NAME , A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_PNO , A.MEMBER_GENDER , A.ADDRESS , A.EMAIL , A.PHONE , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.MEMBER_ROLE , A.MEMBER_STATUS FROM MG_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.MEMBER_ID = ?
